subject: Simsonn Plus X or Pro Ultra?
description_text:
Hello,

I'm having difficulty deciding between the two options. Could you clarify
the differences besides the RGB feature?

Also, are they available in Europe?

conversations.body_text: Hi Net Kek，  Pro X Ultra脚踏板采用 16 位分辨率，刹车系统支持 8 级液压调节和 RGB 灯光。 如果您不介意 RGB 灯光，Plus X也是一个不错的选择。
Thank you!  I bought it from amazon.de. Order #028-7838377-6044341.  That's the latest version with the updated dumper. Is that correct? https://www.amazon.de/-/en/dp/B0DYV6N2G8?ref=fed_asin_title
